item.title: Fade Into You
item.description: [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/hear_me_now.md#take-another-look-around-me-vyl-wnanory|I wanna hold the hand inside you]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/hear_me_now.md#take-another-look-around-me-vyl-wnanory|I wanna take a breath that’s true]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/hear_me_now.md#take-another-look-around-me-vyl-wnanory|I look to you and I see nothing]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/hear_me_now.
